description: The HC-05 is a compact Bluetooth SPP (Serial Port Protocol) module based on the CSR Bluecore 04 chip, supporting Bluetooth 2.0+EDR with up to 3 Mbps data rate. It features a 2.4 GHz radio, integrated antenna, low‑power 1.8 V operation, and programmable UART interface.
application_examples: Wireless serial communication between microcontrollers and PCs
Remote control of devices via Bluetooth
Sensor data transmission to mobile devices

getting_started.connection_guide: Connect VCC to 3.3–5 V, GND to ground, TXD to MCU RX, RXD to MCU TX. Use KEY pin to enter AT mode (connect to VCC). PIO9/PIO8 can drive status LEDs.

example_code.explaination: This sketch forwards data between the Arduino serial monitor and the HC-05 module, enabling simple Bluetooth serial communication.
